name: Send PDF for Contact Form 7
author: Florent Maillefaud

sections.description:
This plugin adds conditional logic to [Contact Form 7].

Send the PDF for Contact Form plugin will allow you to recover the data yourself via your form to insert them into a PDF built and prepared by you.

This plugin requires the installation and activation of the plugin Contact Form 7.

DEMO HERE
[Tutorial Here]

Translations: Here

Contribute

You can contribute with code, issues and ideas at the GitHub repository.

If you like it, a review is appreciated ðŸ™‚
sections.installation:
1. Upload the full directory into your ‘/wp-content/plugins’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin at the plugin administration page
  3. Open the plugin configuration page, which is located under ‘Contact->Send PDF with CF7’
sections.faq:
Is there a tutorial?

Read here Tutorial available (in french).

This plugin is free?

Yes. If you want, you can support this project here: https://restezconnectes.fr/a-propos/
